name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.UpgradeDropwizard_4_To_5

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.annotation.AddClassAnnotationIfAnnotationExists
displayName: Add annotation if target annotations exist
description: Adds annotation if class has any of the specified target annotations.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"annotationToAdd","type":"String","displayName":"Annotation to add","description":"The annotation that should be added.","example":"org.springframework.stereotype.Component","required":true},{"name":"targetAnnotationClassName","type":"String","displayName":"Target annotation class name","description":"The annotation that should looked for.","example":"javax.ws.rs.Path","required":true},{"name":"annotateInnerClasses","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Annotate inner classes","description":"Boolean whether to annotate inner classes of the matched annotation"}]

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.annotation.AddClassAnnotationIfSuperTypeExists
displayName: Add annotation if target supertypes exist

category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.annotation.micrometer.CodahaleTimedToMicrometerTimed

category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.config.RemoveAndExcludeDependency
displayName: Combined dependency management to remove and exclude
description: Combines excluding transitive dependencies and removing direct dependencies.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"groupId","type":"String","displayName":"Group ID to remove","description":"The first part of a dependency coordinate to remove 'org.mockito'","example":"org.mockito","required":true},{"name":"artifactId","type":"String","displayName":"Artifact ID to remove","description":"The second part of a dependency coordinate to remove 'mockito-core'","example":"mockito-core","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.general.RemoveMethodsByPackage
description: Removes any method that has a return type or parameter type from the specified package.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"packageFilter","type":"String","displayName":"Package filter","description":"The package name to filter methods by. Methods with return types or parameter types in this package (or subpackages) will be removed.","example":"com.example.unwanted","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.general.RemoveVariablesByPackage
displayName: Remove class variables matching package filter
description: Removes class-level variables from classes in the specified package.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"packageFilter","type":"String","displayName":"Package filter","description":"The package name to filter methods by. Methods with return types or parameter types in this package (or subpackages) will be removed.","example":"com.example.unwanted","required":true},{"name":"removeOnlyClassScope","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Remove only class scope","description":"Ignores variables that are method scope","example":"com.example.unwanted","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.jetty.MigrateJettyHandlerSignature
description: Migrates custom Jetty handler implementations from Jetty 11's `AbstractHandler` (used in Dropwizard 4.x) to Jetty 12's `Handler.Abstract` (used in Dropwizard 5.x). This changes the `handle` method signature and updates `baseRequest.setHandled(true)` to use `Callback` and return `true`.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.method.ChangeSuperType
description: Changes the superclass of a specified class to a new superclass.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"targetClass","type":"String","displayName":"Target class","description":"The fully qualified name of the class whose superclass should be changed.","example":"com.myorg.MyClass","required":true},{"name":"newSuperclass","type":"String","displayName":"New superclass","description":"The fully qualified name of the new superclass to extend or interface to implement.","example":"com.myorg.NewSuperclass","required":true},{"name":"keepTypeParameters","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Keep type parameters","description":"Whether to keep existing type parameters on the target class declaration."},{"name":"convertToInterface","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Convert to interface","description":"If the new supertype is an interface, setting this to true converts 'extends' to 'implements'."},{"name":"removeUnnecessaryOverrides","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Remove unnecessary overrides","description":"Remove method Override annotations that override methods from the *old* superclass but are no longer necessary with the new superclass."}]

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.method.RemoveSuperTypeByType
displayName: Remove supertype by fully qualified name matches
description: Removes a specified type from class extends or implements clauses.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"typeToRemove","type":"String","displayName":"Fully qualified name of the superclass to remove","description":"Supertypes that match this name are to be removed","example":"io.dropwizard.Configuration","required":true}]

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.method.RemoveUnnecessaryOverride
description: Removes `@Override` annotations from methods that don't actually override or implement any method. This helps maintain clean code by removing incorrect annotations that could be misleading.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"ignoreAnonymousClassMethods","type":"Boolean","displayName":"Ignore methods in anonymous classes","description":"When enabled, ignore @Override annotations on methods in anonymous classes."}]

name: org.openrewrite.java.dropwizard.method.RemoveUnnecessarySuperCalls
displayName: Remove `super` calls when the class does not extend another class
description: Removes calls to `super(...)` or `super.someMethod(...)` if the class does not have a real superclass besides `java.lang.Object`.
category3Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Dropwizard](https://dropwizard.io/) applications.
category4Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
